data.comment: The match is underway in Sapporo.
Yuichi Nishimura awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 1, Sapporo drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Ball goes out of play for a Sapporo goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sapporo.
In the minute 3, Jay Bothroyd (Sapporo) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Sapporo have been awarded a corner by Yuichi Nishimura.
In Sapporo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 5, Free kick for Sapporo in the half of Cerezo.
Important block from the Cerezo defence as Akito Fukumori fires in a strike for Sapporo.
Corner awarded to Sapporo.
In the minute 7, Yuichi Nishimura signals a Sapporo throw-in in Cerezo's half.
Sapporo drive upfield and Lucas Fernandes gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Cerezo defender.
Throw-in high up the field for Sapporo in Sapporo.
In the minute 9, Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Sapporo in their own half.
Sapporo have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 13, Throw-in for Sapporo in their own half.
Cerezo's Tatsuhiro Sakamoto attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Sapporo at Sapporo.
In the minute 15, Lucas Fernandes gets his shot on target but fails to score for Sapporo.
Cerezo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Cerezo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 17, Free kick for Sapporo in their own half.
Free kick Cerezo.
Cerezo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 19, Sapporo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Bruno Pereira Mendes (Cerezo) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Sapporo defenders.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Sapporo in their own half.
In the minute 22, Can Sapporo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Cerezo's half?
Yuichi Nishimura signals a throw-in for Sapporo, close to Cerezo's area.
Throw-in for Cerezo at Sapporo.
In the minute 28, Throw-in Cerezo.
Sapporo are coming forward and Anderson Lopes gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Cerezo have a goal kick.
In the minute 29, Sapporo awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Sapporo, Bruno Pereira Mendes (Cerezo) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Sapporo at Sapporo.
Tatsuhiro Sakamoto for Cerezo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Yuichi Nishimura awards Sapporo a goal kick.
In the minute 35, Bruno Pereira Mendes for Cerezo drives towards goal at Sapporo. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Can Sapporo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cerezo's half?
Yuichi Nishimura awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 37, Throw-in for Cerezo close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Sapporo in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Cerezo goal kick.
In the minute 40, Cerezo move into a 0-1 lead through a Bruno Pereira Mendes header.
Riku Matsuda with an assist there.
Sapporo's Takuro Kaneko breaks free at Sapporo. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 41, Cerezo have a goal kick.
In Sapporo, Yoshiaki Komai (Sapporo) misses the target with a header.
Yuichi Nishimura awards Cerezo a goal kick.
In the minute 44, In Sapporo Cerezo attack through Bruno Pereira Mendes. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Sapporo at Sapporo.
Cerezo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the away team in Sapporo.
Yuichi Nishimura will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Sapporo.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Cerezo at Sapporo.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is underway at Sapporo.
In the minute 46, Cerezo needs to be cautious. Sapporo have an attacking throw-in.
Sapporo have been awarded a corner by Yuichi Nishimura.
Throw-in for Sapporo in the half of Cerezo.
In the minute 51, Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Sapporo in their own half.
Sapporo to take a throw-in in Cerezo territory.
Throw-in Cerezo.
In the minute 52, Ball safe as Cerezo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Sapporo in their own half.
Yuichi Nishimura awards Sapporo a goal kick.
In the minute 54, Goal! Cerezo extend their lead to 0-2 through Hiroshi Kiyotake.
Cerezo needs to be cautious. Sapporo have an attacking throw-in.
Cerezo have a goal kick.
In the minute 57, Daiki Suga is replacing Yoshiaki Komai for Sapporo at Sapporo.
Kazuki Fukai is on a sub for Tomoki Takamine for Sapporo.
Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
In the minute 59, Can Cerezo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sapporo's half?
Cerezo to take a throw-in in Sapporo territory.
Cerezo drives forward and Bruno Pereira Mendes gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 60, Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Sapporo in their own half.
Sapporo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Sapporo, Anderson Lopes of Sapporo is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 62, Cerezo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jay Bothroyd for Sapporo has been booked by Yuichi Nishimura and receives a first yellow card.
Eiichi Katayama (Cerezo) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 64, Cerezo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a Sapporo throw-in in Cerezo's half.
Jay Bothroyd (Sapporo) heads in to reduce the deficit. The score is now 1-2.
In the minute 65, Great play from Lucas Fernandes to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Sapporo in their own half.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Sapporo in their own half.
In the minute 67, Sapporo's Jay Bothroyd gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Cerezo defender.
Throw-in high up the field for Sapporo in Sapporo.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sapporo.
In the minute 68, Free kick for Sapporo in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Cerezo goal kick.
Corner awarded to Sapporo.
In the minute 75, Ball goes out of play for a Cerezo goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Cerezo in the half of Sapporo.
In the minute 76, Miguel Angel Lotina is making the team's first substitution at Sapporo with Yuta Toyokawa replacing Hiroshi Kiyotake.
Cerezo make their second substitution with Yusuke Maruhashi replacing Tatsuhiro Sakamoto.
Free kick in a good position for Cerezo!
In the minute 77, In Sapporo Cerezo drive forward through Yusuke Maruhashi. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Bruno Pereira Mendes (Cerezo) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Cerezo have been awarded a corner by Yuichi Nishimura.
In the minute 78, Yasuki Kimoto (Cerezo) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Sapporo have a goal kick.
Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
In the minute 80, Great finish from Bruno Pereira Mendes to give Cerezo a 1-3 lead.
That's a fine assist from Yuta Toyokawa.
Cerezo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 82, It's a goal kick for the home team in Sapporo.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Cerezo in their own half.
Miguel Angel Lotina (Cerezo) is making a third substitution, with Toshiyuki Takagi replacing Bruno Pereira Mendes.
Yuichi Nishimura awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 84, The home team have replaced Anderson Lopes with Ryota Hayasaka. This is the third substitution made today by Michael Petrovic.
Hugo Vieira is replacing Jay Bothroyd for Sapporo at Sapporo.
In the minute 86, Can Cerezo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sapporo's half?
Throw-in for Sapporo at Sapporo.
Michael Petrovic is making the team's fifth substitution at Sapporo with Naoki Ishikawa replacing Akito Fukumori.
In the minute 89, Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Cerezo in their own half.
Yuichi Nishimura awards Cerezo a goal kick.
Cerezo to take a throw-in in Sapporo territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
At Sapporo the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Goal kick for Cerezo at Sapporo.
Yuichi Nishimura awards Sapporo a goal kick.
Throw-in Sapporo.
Corner awarded to Sapporo.
Cerezo's Toshiyuki Takagi gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Sapporo have a goal kick.
It's 1-3 as the referee blows for full-time.
Ken Tokura is replacing Hiroaki Okuno for the away team.
